Description:     
"Castle Storm" is a delicate subject of war 2D horizontal version of the game, by the ZenStudios company responsible for production and distribution, which can be run stand-alone, but also network online.    Medieval tower defense strategy game "Castle Storm (CastleStorm)", which is a 2D side-style bow tower defense games, a mix of real-time strategy games, resource management, as well as cold weapons fighting a beautiful, colorful scenes.    In the game, players will deploy soldiers involved in different occupations castle defense, and the use of such Morningstar, apple grenades, guided eagle, and even flying goats to attack the enemy. If all this wonderful means are unable to stop the enemy, we can summon powerful spells, and help us keep the enemy outside the castle.    Game style is very strange, the physical effects are also very realistic portrayal, using different weapons against each other castles or units, enemy buildings and man have different reactions, players not only to operate their own castle, but also learn how to capture someone else's castle.
